channel.title: I need a little help
channel.description:
ok i read the ultimate server guide and im stuck on chapter 6
CHAPTER 6
Ok this is fairly simple how to set up a no-ip for your server. First off go to no-ip:
No-ip
Then make a new account/log-in. Then click on "Redirect/host" button. Then put in the name of your server and make the domain anything you want/ anything that is available. Make sure that the IP address in there is your INTERNET IP ADRESS, NOT your computer's IP address. This will show at the top-right-hand-corner of the no-ip screen. This will show your INTERNET IP ADDRESS. Ok now save it and now as the long as the rule in the router is set and the server is running; then you and other people should be able to use that new domain you made to log into your server!
what do i do can any 1 break it down a little to make it easier?

item.title: I need a little help
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

paste this into your compiler @echo off title Compiler "%ProgramFiles%\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause

and this in your runserver.bat or run.bat

@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause

Read full topic

item.title: I need a little help
item.dc:creator: @pur3str_pk2 pur3str pk2
item.description:
@pur3str_pk2 wrote:

eh, You’ve too make it that your internet can connect to the IP and the router doesn’t block…
Go to Http://www.portforward.com/ to make the port into your router, The port = 43594

item.title: I need a little help

item.description:
@dustin.s1001 wrote:

ok i read the ultimate server guide and im stuck on chapter 6

CHAPTER 6

Ok this is fairly simple how to set up a no-ip for your server. First off go to no-ip:

No-ip

Then make a new account/log-in. Then click on “Redirect/host” button. Then put in the name of your server and make the domain
anything you want/ anything that is available. Make sure that the IP address in there is your INTERNET IP ADRESS, NOT your
computer’s IP address. This will show at the top-right-hand-corner of the no-ip screen. This will show your INTERNET IP ADDRESS.
Ok now save it and now as the long as the rule in the router is set and the server is running; then you and other people should be
able to use that new domain you made to log into your server!
